api
Class DefaultResource

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Handler
      org.restlet.resource.Resource
          api.DefaultResource

public class DefaultResource
extends org.restlet.resource.Resource

Resource that is used for anything that does not match the handled resource URL. It responds with "403 forbidden" and a descriptive message body.

Constructor Summary

          Construct the default resource.

Method Detail

represent

public org.restlet.resource.Representation represent(org.restlet.resource.Variant variant)
                                              throws org.restlet.resource.ResourceException
On GET return the error messages indicating valid URL formats. For HTML mediatype also provide a link to login.
